Description:

Prepare to combat terror without limits and frantic with FEAR 3, the best horror shooter in first person, including dramatic improvements now! Live the experience in single or cooperative as Pointman, a genetically engineered super soldier with supernatural reflexes and able to manipulate time. You can also play co-operatively as Paxton Fettel, a being whose incredible telekinetic powers paranormal has returned to life after death. 
Alma is here ... Never challenge FEAR alone! 
Eight months ago, Point Man and his squad FEAR were commissioned to arrest the stranger who had led a battalion of super soldiers secretly controlled telepathically in Armacham research center in the city of Fairport, northwest of the USA. UU. During this mission, Point Man discovered that the man was not alone. In fact, he found that he had to destroy was his own brother, Paxton Fettel cannibal, and his tortured and powerful mother, Alma Wade, both endowed with telepathic powers and a product of the perverse Armacham paranormal experiments. Despite this discovery, Point Man continued to lead the remaining members of the FEAR team to stop these objectives, at whatever cost. In a last desperate attempt to stop the murderous slaughter of the couple, the FEAR team launched an explosive chain of events that seemed to meet its objective. Of course, at the expense of destroying the city, its inhabitants and almost all members of the squad Point Man 
Months after the bombing, the events in Fairport have made clear that the psychic presence of Alma has survived? And what's worse, her psychic power is growing and coming into the world of reality. Now, his agony supernatural plagues the city repeatedly in an attempt to ensure the survival of their lineage and reuniting her family. The security forces remain focused on Armacham removing all evidence of what happened in the city, and the rest of the squad FEAR continues the mission to stop Alma. 
Having broken the chain of command and Point Man in front of all, where land their loyalty? Will it be faithful to his brother Paxton Fettel, who has returned from the dead without a clear purpose and does not seem willing to move away from Point Man? Or is loyal to Alma, his pregnant mother, with their sickly but huge paranormal powers? Or stay by your squad mates FEAR, determined to save the world, but at the cost of destroying the only blood ties that Point Man has ever had?
